WorkItem.Description: It would be very helpful to convert the C# app to VB.NET for general availability.

Comments.Message: I'd like to do this if I can find time, and would be happy if anyone else wants to help out. Would that still be useful if the app is converted but the tutorial isn't?
I'd be happy to contribute to this effort.  Please let me know how to get involved.  Thanks.
@smithderekm (and anyone else) I'd love help on that. You can convert portions of the site and upload them. We could also fork the code for a VB.NET version. Who's interested?

I've created a vb.net fork. I started with a fork on this project (https://hg01.codeplex.com/forks/coderdennis/mvcmusicstorevb), but moved the fork to its own CodePlex project at http://vbmvcmusicstore.codeplex.com 

It's now complete for version 2.1 and I'll be merging in the version 3.0 changes next. I'd love to have some help as I haven't started modifying the text of the tutorial yet. I learned a lot by just going through the tutorial to get the code to this point.
